Reviews.Title: new Nikon 5300
Reviews.Author: Melvin D Witte
Reviews.Content: The new Nikon 5300 was a big step up from a Nikon D50 .I like the 18-140mm Zoom Lens it is great. The new Nikon has a lot of new setting to try new fun for me,

Reviews.Title: recieved different as describe and no battery for the Nikon D 5300
Reviews.Author: Wyne B. Inong
Reviews.Content: no battery was sent for the Nikon D 5300 just the spare battery.I don't like the Bower sfd 290 they send me different item it should be the Precision design dslr high power auto flash.Nikon D 5300 is a good dslr camera I like it I rated one because of the missing item and received different item as described I contacted the seller if they will send me the missing battery but they don't. the seller is CAMETA CAMERA. DONT BUY AT CAMETA CAMERA THEY ARE CHEATER
